title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisites: EC31005Lumped and distributed circuit elements at RF and Microwave frequencies . S-parameter description of passive and active networks . network concept . Obstacles in waveguides (post , diaphragms etc.) Waveguide junctions, Excitations of waveguides and cavities . Periodic structures and filters. RF and microwave Power combiners and dividers.
